обо: about (used only with first person prepositional case pronoun)
наотмашь: with the back of your hand
вгорячах: in the heat of the moment
ВЧК: All-Russian Special Commission for Combating Counter-revolution and Sabotage
забрезжило: it is just beginning to get light
лётчик-миллионер: pilot who has flown over a million kilometres
нелишне: it is not out of place
оргтехника: technical means and equipment for accounting
